data-analyticsId="overview"><div class="doc-metadata"><div class="doc-sharing-section"><div class="doc-sharing-widget"><div class="plus-share-container"><g:plusone count="true" size="medium" source="google:market" href="https://market.android.com/details?id=com.bluefroggaming.popdat"></g:plusone></div><div class="twitter-share-container"><a href="javascript:void(0)" title="Tweet" App</h4><dl class="doc-metadata-list" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/MobileSoftwareApplication"><meta itemprop="name" content="Pop Dat" /><meta itemprop="image" content="https://lh3.ggpht.com/e6QqjMM9K__moeCm2C5HRb0SmGX0XqzhnhiE1MUx8MdNVdQbQW9rhFX_qmtbtBxHAa0=w124" /><span itemprop="author" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="Blue Frog Gaming" /><meta itemprop="url" content="/store/apps/developer?id=Blue+Frog+Gaming" /></span><dt>Rating:</dt><dd itemprop="aggregateRating" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating"><div class="ratings goog-inline-block" title="Rating: 4.5 stars (Above average)"itemprop="ratingValue" content="4.5"><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_half_dark"></div></div>(<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="6">6</span>)</dd><dt>Updated:</dt><dd><time itemprop="datePublished">August 27, 2011</time></dd><dt>Current Version:</dt><dd itemprop="softwareVersion">1.0</dd><dt itemprop="operatingSystems" content="Android">Requires Android:</dt><dd>2.2 and up</dd><dt>Category:</dt><dd><a href="/store/apps/category/ARCADE?feature=category-nav">Arcade &amp; Action</a></dd><dt>Installs:</dt><dd itemprop="numDownloads">100 - 500</dd><dt>Size:</dt><dd itemprop="fileSize">9.0M</dd><dt>Price:</dt><dd itemprop="offers" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Offer"><meta itemprop="price" content="0" />Free<span itemprop="seller" itemscope itemtype="http://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="Android" /></span></dd><dt>Content Rating:</dt><dd itemprop="contentRating">Everyone</dd></dl></div><div class="doc-overview"><h2>Description</h2><div id="doc-description-container"class="doc-description-collapsed"><div class="doc-description toggle-overflow-contents"><div id="doc-original-text" >Experience the next level of chain reaction games with ’Pop Dat’.<p>An action-packed blend of split-second skill and luck-based gameplay! Set off consecutive chains of particles to rack up massive combos as the energy bar refills. Keep those explosions comin’ or else it’s Game Over!<p>Features:<br>• Addictive ‘Endurance Mode’ that gets more challenging the longer you play!<br>• Radiant, expressive, and colorful graphics that take full advantage of High Resolution Displays!<br>• Beat the high scores of your friends and climb the ranks with competitive Leaderboards!<br>• Toe-tappingly catchy soundtrack that highlights every ‘Pop’ and ‘Boom’ of the on-screen action!<br>• Updates packed with new features and goodies coming soon!</div></div><div class="doc-description-overflow"></div></div><div class="doc-description-show-all"><div class="doc-description-show-all-button toggle-overflow-button toggle-overflow-collapsed goog-inline-block" style="display: none;" tabindex="0" data-toggletarget= "doc-description-container" data-overflowclass="doc-description-collapsed"><span class="doc-description-show-more">More</span><span class="doc-description-show-less">Less</span></div></div><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://bluefroggaming.com&usg=AFQjCNG3VNln-buAN5ceD5eCMvk-yOvMDw" target="_blank" rel="nofollow">Visit Developer&#39;s Website</a><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http://bluefroggaming.com&usg=AFQjCNG3VNln-buAN5ceD5eCMvk-yOvMDw" target="_blank" rel="nofollow"class="more-arrow-link"><span class="more-arrow">&rsaquo;</span></a><span class="contact-developer-spacer"></span><a href="mailto:support@hdgames.zendesk.com" rel="nofollow">Email Developer</a><a href="mailto:support@hdgames.zendesk.com" rel="nofollow"class="more-arrow-link"><span class="more-arrow">&rsaquo;</span></a></div><div class="doc-overview-screenshots"><h2>App Screenshots</h2><div August 28, 2011</span> - Motorola Droid X with version 1.0<span><a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.bluefroggaming.popdat&amp;reviewId=02664502362089448406"><div class="goog-inline-block review-permalink" title="Link to this review"></div></a></span><div class="doc-review-ratings-line"><div class="ratings goog-inline-block" title="Rating: 5.0 stars (Above average)"><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div><div class="goog-inline-block star SPRITE_star_on_dark"></div></div><h4 class="review-title">Fun and Addicting!</h4></div><p class="review-text">Before I know it, I&#39;ve spent hours trying for a new high score. The game is extremely fun and keeps you interested as your strive for your longest chain reaction and a new high score!</p><div class="review-footer goog-inline-block"><div class="doc-review-label">&nbsp;</div><div class="per-review-controls goog-inline-block"></div></div></div><hr></div></div></div></div></div></div></div><div id="details-tab-3" class="doc-whatsnew padded-content2" style="display:none" data-analyticsId="whatsnew"><h2>What's New</h2><div class="doc-whatsnew-container"><div class="doc-permissions">No recent changes.</div></div></div><div id="details-tab-4" class="doc-specs padded-content2" style="display:none" data-analyticsId="permissions"><h2>Permissions</h2><div class="doc-specs-container"><h4 class="doc-permissions-header">This application has access to the following:</h4><div id="doc-permissions-dangerous" class="doc-permissions"><ul class="doc-permissions-list"><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Network communication</span><div class="doc-permission-description">full Internet access</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to create network sockets.</div></li><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Phone calls</span><div class="doc-permission-description">read phone state and identity</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to access the phone features of the device. An app with this permission can determine the phone number and serial number of this phone, whether a call is active, the number that call is connected to and the like.</div></li></ul></div><div id="doc-permissions-toggle" class="doc-permissions-toggle" data-toggletarget="doc-permissions-safe doc-permissions-show-all doc-permissions-hide"><span id="doc-permissions-show-all" class="toggle-button goog-inline-block">Show all</span><span id="doc-permissions-hide" class="toggle-button toggle-button-hide goog-inline-block" style="display:none">Hide</span></div><div id="doc-permissions-safe" class="doc-permissions" style="display:none"><ul class="doc-permissions-list"><li class="doc-permission-group"><span class="doc-permission-group-title">Network communication</span><div class="doc-permission-description">view network state</div><div class="doc-permission-description-full">Allows the app to view the state of all networks.</div></li></ul></div></div></div></td></tr></table></div><div id="footer"><a class="footer-link" href="/store/account">My Orders &amp; Settings</a>|<a class="footer-link"><select
